Seeing no one, the dragon focused again on his spark feelings to
detect the bot. He concentrated, again seeing the estranged spark, but
this time, there seemed to be a feeling of amazement too. Focusing
even more, he discovered its nature... a decepticon female warrior...
and he felt her location.

He got out of his trance and flew quickly to the sides of the wounded
bot. He lowered his head as a sign that he was not here for war, but
rather for help.

AzureBlade: You are wounded, are you not? If you can hear me, I am
here to help you.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 6/5/03 11:17:59 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Hydras was uneasy, MAxima hadn't reported and that was unusual. The 
> > male opened her commlink in MAxima freceuncy and said "Hydras to 
> > Maxima, do you copy?.... Maxima where're you, my sweet Tigress?"
> > 
> > 
> 
> There was no response to his call. In fact... she never received it.
Her com 
> systems were totally down. 
> The only response was fuzz. 
> 
> ****************
> 
> Her optics were upon the blue dragon before her, her form stiff like a 
> statue.
